ygData.subject: Faction question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have raised a dark elf necro up to level 18 and am visiting High Pass. The volunteer just inside the gate past the orc camp still scowls at me ready to
ygData.messageBody:
I have raised a dark elf necro up to level 18 and am visiting High Pass. The "volunteer" just inside the gate past the orc camp still scowls at me ready to attack. How many orcs must I annihilate before they view me a little more friendly in there? Is there some kind of shortcut to better faction here?

I have spent the bulk of my time in North Ro, Oasis, Befallen, Lavastorm and of course the dark wood outside Neriak.

Any help on improving my faction would be appreciated!

Wyrmy, 18 lvl DE Necro, Bristlebane
